title: Microsoft 365 users report Outlook, Teams won't start or freezes
description: Network and IT admins have been dealing with ongoing Microsoft 365 issues this week, reporting that some end users cannot use Microsoft Outlook or other Microsoft 365 apps. [...]

title: Microsoft Teams bug allows malware delivery from external accounts
description: Security researchers have found a simple way to deliver malware to an organization with Microsoft Teams, despite restrictions in the application for files from external sources. [...]

title: NSA shares tips on blocking BlackLotus UEFI malware attacks
description: The U.S. National Security Agency (NSA) released today guidance on how to defend against BlackLotus UEFI bootkit malware attacks. [...]

title: CISA orders govt agencies to patch bugs exploited by Russian hackers
description: On Thursday, the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) added six more security flaws to its known exploited vulnerabilities (KEV) list. [...]

title: Mirai botnet targets 22 flaws in D-Link, Zyxel, Netgear devices
description: A variant of the Mirai botnet is targeting almost two dozen vulnerabilities aiming to take control of D-Link, Arris, Zyxel, TP-Link, Tenda, Netgear, and MediaTek devices to use them for distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks. [...]

title: Microsoft: Hackers hijack Linux systems using trojanized OpenSSH version
description: Microsoft says Internet-exposed Linux and Internet of Things (IoT) devices are being hijacked in brute-force attacks as part of a recently observed cryptojacking campaign. [...]

title: VMware fixes vCenter Server bugs allowing code execution, auth bypass
description: VMware has addressed multiple high-severity security flaws in vCenter Server, which can let attackers gain code execution and bypass authentication on unpatched systems. [...]

title: Millions of GitHub repos likely vulnerable to RepoJacking, researchers say
description: Millions of GitHub repositories may be vulnerable to dependency repository hijacking, also known as "RepoJacking," which could help attackers deploy supply chain attacks impacting a large number of users. [...]

title: DuckDuckGo browser for Windows available for everyone as public beta
description: DuckDuckGo has released its privacy-centric browser for Windows to the general public. It is a beta version available for download with no restrictions. [...]
